name: Glitch Garden (Miiik)
description:
Glitch Garden is a single player tower-defense game where your goal is to stop evil creatures from getting across your garden and entering your home. 

You'll unlock creatures that will help you fight off these attackers  as you progress through the 6 levels in the game and you'll have to swiftly adapt your strategy and your defending team composition as the attackers gets stronger.

Best of luck and defend your home!

-Michael Uzoegwu
